# alertStyle

**Instance Property**

Indicates the alert’s severity level.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var alertStyle: NSAlert.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

See the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAlert/Style] enumeration for the list of alert style constants.

## Configuring Alerts

- **layout()**: Specifies that the alert must do immediate layout instead of lazily just before display.
- **accessoryView**: The alert’s accessory view.
- **showsHelp**: Specifies whether the alert has a help button.
- **helpAnchor**: The alert’s HTML help anchor.
- **delegate**: The alert’s delegate.
